CustomErrorMessages:
<CustomErrorMessage code="400" title="Something’s gone wrong” description="Please try again later"/>
<CustomErrorMessage code="429" title="Something’s gone wrong” description="Please try again later" />
<CustomErrorMessage code="501" title="Something’s gone wrong" description="Please try again later” />
<CustomErrorMessage code="1000" title="You’re not signed in properly” description="Please sign out and sign in again to continue" callToAction="Sign out" actionUrl="Home/logout" />
<CustomErrorMessage code="1100" title="You haven’t verified your email address yet" description="Please verify your email address to continue" callToAction="Verify your email address” actionUrl="Register/Step2" />
<CustomErrorMessage code="1102" title="You haven’t verified your email address yet” description="Please check your email and junk mail folder. If you can’t find our email, you can request another one in {remainingTime} " /> <CustomErrorMessage code="1103" title="You haven’t verified your email address yet" description="Please verify your email address to continue" callToAction="Verify your email address” actionUrl="Register/Step2" />
<CustomErrorMessage code="1108" title="Your PIN has expired" description="The PIN we sent you in the post has expired" callToAction="Get another PIN” actionUrl="Register/ConfirmPIN" /> <CustomErrorMessage code="1109" title="You’re already registered for this service” "Submit your organisation’s gender pay gap data" actionUrl="Submit/Step1" /> <CustomErrorMessage code="1110" title="You’ve made too many attempts to verify your email address" description="Please sign out and try again in {remainingTime}” actionUrl="Home/LogOut" />
<CustomErrorMessage code="1113" title="You’ve entered the incorrect PIN too many times” description="Sign in again and enter your PIN in {remainingTime}" callToAction="Sign out" actionUrl="Home/LogOut" />
